Posts.Content: Hi, I have a history of benign biopsies with flat epithelial atypia and hyperplasia. On my yearly Breast MRI they found two masses one 5mm and one 3mm that they say could potentially be intramammary lymph nodes. That's what they originally said about the mass that turned out to have the flat epithelial atypia and hyperplasia tissue when biopsied two years ago (living in a different state then). I guess what bothers me is that even with the MRI they are saying
Posts.Title: Intramammary Lymph node
